title: Negative Space
lyrics:
In a negative space
I wanna leave it
I’m turning round
Right as you’re leaving

A cruel mistake

I can’t believe it

Who can I trust

Now that you’re not breathing



Oh pity there’s no saviour,

Pity that’s not on

I get it though, I get it though

They’re working on a troubled brow

And it’s lasted

Oh, it’s lasted

But if they’re really watching this then 

Why’ve they not reacted



Oh my gut sinks low

My gut sinks low

I sat in here for hours while I

Thought of what you wrote

I cried in here for hours while I 

Looked at what you wrote

I stopped checking for the hour from the

Last time that we spoke

Oh my gut sinks low

My gut sinks low

And if we’re really doing this and you’re

Sure it’s not a joke, oh



How long’s forever

How long's forever



All I dared to ask for

But now i’ll never know

If you’d hoped for better futures

Or just planned to keep on going

And your body is still lasting

Yeah it’s lasting

I’m sure I used to make you laugh but

Now you’re not reacting



My gut sinks low

My gut sinks low

I sat in there for hours trying to

Show you what I wrote

I waited in for hours just in

Case I heard you spoke

I’m fine to wait for hours just to

Hear you play a note, and



How long’s forever

How long’s forever

How long’s forever

How long’s forever



And I still see you every time I’m down

My failing vision’s cruelest blunder

I still hear you every time i’m down

Laughing like you won’t fall under



In a negative state

I can’t believe it 

I’m turning round

Right as you’re turning



In a negative space 

I wanna leave it

Yeah I want out

If you’re not returning



In a negative state

I can’t believe it 

I’m turning round

Right as you’re turning



In a negative space 

I wanna leave it

Yeah I want out

If you’re not returning



And I still see you every time I’m down

I still hear you every time I’m down

I still see you every time I’m down

I still hear you every time I’m down

I still see you every time I’m down

I still hear you every time I’m down

I still see you every time I’m down
